#summary List of supported charts and widgets.
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =
This page contains the list of supported charts.

However the plugin is built on a flexible way where most of the parameters received as input are just sent to the XML. This means that other charts or widgets with a similar structure might already be supported.


= Charts =

The following charts are supported:

  * Bar2D
  * Bar3D
  * Pie2D
  * Pie3D
  * Column3D
  * Column2D
  * Line

= Licensed Version Charts =

The following charts and widgets are also supported when using the Licensed Fusion Charts version.
